name: Comfy Glade [agdg Boat jam]
description:
I originally planned to have a lot of hours to spend on this for the /agdg/ Boat Jam. Turns out, I got landed with more shifts at work than I thought I would.

This demo at best illustrates

  • game play mechanics
  • art style direction
  • upgrades

In the finished product, this boat | fishing aspect will only make up maybe 40 - 50%. What is missing (apart from everything land based) is

  • plot direction
  • nicer art (I'll be able to pay an artguy in a few months)
  • more fish types
  • upgrading your craft (boat type)
  • a lot of other features™

Movement is controlled by mouse clicks. Use WASD to move only if you must.
